01 文化传承的中国现代设计
—— 访谈“L+”品牌首席设计师李凤朗先生
Cultural Heritage in Modern Chinese Design : Interview with Mr. Li Fenglang, Chief Designer of L+
王静 WANG Jing 武汉理工大学，湖北武汉 430070（Wuhan University of Technology，430070 Wuhan Hubei）
摘要：中国传统文化博大精深、兼容并蓄，具有重要的社会价值和艺术价值。现代设计的创新离不开传统文化这一根基，中国传 统文化中的民族特征、地域特征以及社会特征为现代设计提供着源源不断的养分。设计不仅要创新还需要传承，将中国传统文化 融合和贯穿在现代设计中，满足用户需求，达成审美共识，才能使中国传统文化在现代设计中得到恰当、合理的继承与发展。 关键词：文化传承；现代设计；创新 Abstract: Traditional Chinese culture is profound and inclusive, with important social and artistic values. The innovation of modern design is inseparable from the foundation of traditional culture. The national, regional and social characteristics of traditional Chinese culture provide a continuous source of nutrients for modern design. Design not only needs innovation but also inheritance. It integrates traditional Chinese culture into modern design, meets user needs, and achieves aesthetic consensus, so that Chinese traditional culture can be properly and reasonably inherited and developed in modern design. Key words: cultural heritage；modern design；innovation

Application of Geometric Decorative Patterns in Furniture Design
李君华 LI Junhua 胡荣 Hu Rong 武汉工程大学， 武汉 430205（Wuhan Institute of Technology，430205 Wuhan）
摘要：中国古代家具以其独特的榫卯工艺结构、简洁雅致的造型、硬木材质、细腻的表现手法，以及深厚的文化底蕴和艺术特色 体现了中国一脉相承的民族文化，对于现代家具设计具有极高的借鉴和鉴赏价值。总结家具史上几何装饰纹样发展变化特征，通 过分析传统几何装饰纹样与现代功能审美的契合点，挖掘迄今问题的解决方法，探索传统几何装饰纹样在现代家具设计中的应用。 最后运用传统几何装饰纹样为中国现代家具设计实践寻找自身特色带来启发，探索中国现代家具设计如何通过应用传统几何纹样 发展自身特色，同时也符合简洁实用、形式追随功能的现代审美观。 关键词：几何形态；传统意蕴；家具；现代设计 Abstract: As a necessity of life, furniture bears the information of times, politics, economy and culture. Ancient Chinese furniture, with its unique mortise and tenon structure, simple and elegant modeling, hardwood materials, exquisite presentation techniques, as well as profound cultural heritage and artistic characteristics, embodies the national culture of China, which has high reference and appreciation value for modern furniture design. This paper summarizes the development and change of geometric decorative patterns in the history of furniture, analyzes the coincidence between traditional geometric decorative patterns and modern functional aesthetics, and explores solutions to problems so far as well as the application of traditional geometric decorative patterns in modern furniture design. Finally, the use of traditional geometric decorative patterns brings inspiration to the practice of modern furniture design in China to find its own characteristics, and explore how Chinese modern furniture design can develop its own characteristics through the application of traditional geometric patterns, which also conforms to the simple and practical modern aesthetics with form following function. Key words: geometric；traditional implication；furniture；modern design

03 战术都市主义： 一种叛逆的城市设计尺度
Tactical Urbanism： A Rebellious Urban Design Scale
黄路 HUANG Lu 刘媛 LIU Yuan 广西艺术学院，广西南宁 530000（Guangxi Arts University，530000 Nanning Guangxi）
摘要：21世纪的西方城市呈现出来的种种社会问题，为城市的合理资源调配带来了前所未有的压力，也让原先所推崇的大尺度设 计和长期性战略规划屡屡碰壁。与此同时，互联网的崛起打破了过去权威部门对信息的垄断，让更多的普通市民有机会介入对城 市发展的讨论。在这种背景下，一种略带叛逆性思想的微小尺度城市设计理念——战术都市主义逢时而生。该主义在诞生后很快 就通过实践证明自己，能够作为超大尺度设计及长期性规划的有效补充手段。而当下的中国，正处于社会转型的新时期，新常态 下将更加关注城市的存量空间问题。原先的长期性、大尺度的战略规划方法，在应对存量更新时已表现得力不从心。此时对战术 都市主义理念的引入，将有重要的意义。 关键词：战术都市主义；战略；微小尺度 Abstract: The various social problems presented by the western cities in the 21st century bring unprecedented pressure to the allocation of urban resources， which also make the originally-advocated large-scale design and long-term strategic planning repeatedly hit a wall. At the same time， the rise of the Internet has broken the previous monopoly of authority on information. Thus， more ordinary citizens have the opportunity to get involved in the discussion of urban development. Under such background， a small scale urban design concept with a little rebel thought -- tactical urbanism forms. Soon after its birth， practices have proved that it is an effective complement to strategic scale design. At present， China is in a new period of social transformation. Under the new normal， people will pay more attention to urban storage space. The original long-term and large-scale strategic planning method is no longer effective in coping with the inventory update. Therefore， it is of great practical significance for the introduction of the concept of tactical urbanism. Key words: tactical urbanism；strategy；mini scale

04 阳新布贴中同构图形的分析 *
Analysis of the Isomorphic Graph of Yangxin Cloth Paste
2 1 胡舒娟 HU Shujuan 石小波 SHI Xiaobo 1. 武汉设计工程学院，武汉 430205（Wuhan Institute of Design and Sciences，430205 Wuhan） 2. 华中农业大学，武汉 430070（Hua Zhong Agriculture University，430070 Wuhan）
摘要：作为国家级非物质文化遗产的阳新布贴在图案上有着鲜明的特点，同构图形就是其一。同构图形是一种特殊的图形处理手 法，在中国有着极为悠久的历史。通过对阳新布贴中最具有代表性的同构图形进行分析，发现其同构图形的特点，找到使用同构 手法的原因，从而更深入地研究阳新布贴的艺术特点，并尝试为其寻找新的创新点。 关键词：阳新布贴；同构；图案；装饰 Abstract: As a national intangible cultural heritage, Yangxin cloth has distinct characteristics in the pattern, isomorphic graphics being one of them. Isomorphic graph is a special method of graphic processing. It has a very long history in China. This paper analyzes the most representative isomorphic figure of Yangxin cloth paste, finds out the characteristics of its isomorphic figure, and the reasons for using isomorphic technique, so as to further study its artistic characteristics and find new ways for its innovation. Key words: Yangxin cloth patch；isomorphism；pattern； decoration

05 “充实之谓美”对当代设计艺术的启示
Fullness as Beauty and Its Inspiration for Modern Design Art
何蓉莹 HE Rongying 西南大学，重庆 400715（Southwest University，400715 Chongqing）
摘要：“充实之谓美”是孟子美学思想中的一个重要命题，不仅仅是关于人格美，孟子还以此将人对人格、道德、审美的追求统摄 起来，他基于道德又超越道德展现的是生命之美，如此之美是作为人之自我完善的过程中欲达到的精神高度，还可延伸至关于美 的欣赏与创造。如何在当前社会环境下把握设计艺术之功利与人性之间的平衡，解决当代设计艺术“见欲不见性”“见文不见质” “见物不见人”等问题，从“充实之谓美”中或许能得到启示。 关键词：孟子；美学；充实；设计艺术；自律 Abstract: Fullness as Beauty is an important proposition of Mencius’ aesthetic thought. It is not only about the beauty of personality， but also about the pursuit of personality， morality and aesthetics. Based on morality and beyond morality， Mencius shows the beauty of life， which is the spiritual height to be achieved in the process of self-perfection， and can be extended to the appreciation and creation of beauty. It is important to keep balance between utilitarianism and humanity of design art in the current social environment and solve the problems such as "invisibility of desire"， "invisibility of literature" and "invisibility of human beings" in modern design. Fullness as Beauty may provide inspirations. Key words: Mencius；aesthetics；fullness；designing art；self-regulation

一、引言 因“充实”不断上升即会达到之后“大”“圣”甚至是 “神”的层次。 “充实之谓美”是孟子美学思想中的一个重要 所以“充实之谓美”不仅仅是关于人格美的 命题，其中强调美并不在于外在文饰而在于生命 命题 ，孟子以此将人对人格 、道德 、审美的追 特征之充实完满，并且，美不仅仅是生命特征充 求统摄起来 ，他基于道德又超越道德展现的是生 实完满后呈现出的最终结果，也是实现这一结果 命之美 ，如此之美是作为人之自我完善的过程中 的过程，是动态发展的，再有，美不会只停留于 欲达到的精神高度 ，还可延伸至关于美的欣赏与 “充实”之“美”，生命特征——“仁、义、礼、智” 创造 。

06 再创插画艺术中的甲骨文文化 *
Re-creating Oracle Culture in Illustration Art
孙慧良 SUN Huiliang 杜鑫 DU Xin 王月 WANG Yue 东北林业大学，黑龙江哈尔滨 150040（Northeast Forestry University，150040 Harbin Heilongjiang ）
摘要：甲骨文是指刻在龟甲或兽骨上的文字,主要用于占卜和记录。甲骨文被认为是当代汉字的原型，也是中国古代最早的成熟文 字。甲骨文对于钻研和追索人类文明的历史有着极其深刻的意义。甲骨文合文字体偏多、图画色彩浓厚、异体字较多等特点，使 其成为插画设计中的重要设计资源，将插画设计与甲骨文结合可以将甲骨文文化及其魅力传达出来，再现甲骨文的艺术感染力。 关键词：甲骨文；插画设计；创新 Abstract: Oracle-bone inscriptions are written on tortoise shells or animal bones, mainly used for divination and recording. Oracle bone inscriptions are believed to be the archetype of contemporary Chinese characters. It is also the most mature writing in ancient China. Oracle- bone inscriptions are of great significance for studying and tracing the history of human civilization. Oracle has a long history. The features of multiple characters, strong picture color and many different characters are important design resources in illustration design. The combination of illustration design and oracle bone inscriptions can express the oracle culture and its own charm and reproduce the artistic appeal of oracle culture. Key words: oracle；illustration design；innovation

郑惠芝 ZHENG Huizhi 罗晓欢 LUO Xiaohuan 重庆师范大学，重庆400000 （Chongqing Normal University，400000 Chongqing）
摘要：90后香港插画师倪传婧运用绘画的语言形式传达了不同的故事和文化精神，凭着天马行空的想象力和旗帜鲜明的中国元素 在强盛的西方艺术界独树一帜。本文旨在解析其作品中的中西绘画语言，为新时代插画创作者探索更加清晰的发展方向并引发相 关思考。通过分析发现，灵动的线条艺术凸显中国神韵，考究的色彩搭配点亮插画魅力，交融的东西方意象彰显文化特色，其作 品完美地把东西方文化和艺术传统融会在一起，呈现出浓郁的东方韵味和西式技艺的绚烂冲击力。 关键词：插画艺术；倪传婧；绘画语言；中国元素 Abstract: Victo Ngai, a Hong Kong illustrator born in the 1990s, used the language form of painting to convey different illustrative stories and cultural spirits. With her unrestrained imagination and distinctive Chinese elements, she set her own school in the powerful western art world。The vivid line art highlights the Chinese verve, the exquisite color collocation illuminates the illustration charm, and the eastern and western images blend to highlight the cultural characteristics。Perfect integration of eastern and western cultural and artistic traditions, so that his works show a strong Oriental charm and western technology gorgeous impact。This paper aims to analyze the Chinese and western painting languages in her works, explore a clearer development direction for illustration creators in the new era and trigger relevant thinking. Key words: the art of illustration；Victo Ngai；painting language；Chinese elements

08 汉代岭南漆艺“殊相”探骊 *
Exploration on the Special Performance of the Lingnan Lacquer Art in Han Dynasty
王金玲 Wang Jinling 华南师范大学，广州 510631（South China Normal University，510631 Guangzhou）
摘要：汉代岭南漆艺“殊相”表现有三：一是在南越文明发展中凝练出一种复合型的地域属性，当中有本土文化、中原汉文化、楚 文化等影响因子；二是富贵气象傲视群雄，汉代岭南“金釦器”之多、使用金色髹涂的高调髹饰手法之娴熟、嵌玉漆器之珍奇，都 是同时期其他地区的漆艺面貌中少有的景观；三是装饰意趣别开生面，犀牛图案、鱼纹装饰、井字格布局、怪兽纹样、狩猎纹漆 画等，都代表了汉代岭南漆艺独特的艺术价值。 关键词：殊相；地域属性；富贵气象；装饰意趣 Abstract: There are three special manifestations of lacquer art in Lingnan of Han dynasty. The first one is the compound regional attribute in the development of South Vietnamese civilization. Among them are the influence factors of local culture, Han culture of the Central Plains, and Chu culture. The second is the magnificent feature. The numbers of “golden button” in Lingnanin in Han dynasty, the use of high-grade enamel decoration with gold enamel, and the rareness of the embedded jade lacquerware, are rare in the lacquer art history compared with the other regions at the same time. The third is the decorative interest. Rhinoceros pattern, fish decoration, Tic Tac, monster pattern, hunting pattern lacquer painting, etc., all represent the unique artistic value of lacquer art in Lingnan in Han Dynasty. Key words: special features；regional attributes；magnificent feature；decorative interest

摘要：阿布尔•卡西姆的陶瓷论述，详细记载了中世纪波斯陶器制作的材料、成分等相关知识；并提及陶器胎、釉和装饰色彩的原 材料组成及其提炼和使用的方法，是研究中世纪波斯陶瓷的重要文献。通过对阿布尔•卡西姆的陶瓷论述文本进行语词分析，结合 陶器制作的工艺方法，研究中世纪波斯陶瓷生产的特点。 关键词：阿布尔•卡西姆；陶瓷论述；文本分析 Abstract: Abū῾l-Qāsim's Ceramic Exposition describes in detail the basic knowledge of the materials and components made by the Persian pottery in the Middle Ages. It refers to the composition of the raw materials of pottery， glazes and decorative colors， as well as the methods of refining and using. It is an important document for the study of Persian ceramics in the Middle Ages. This paper studies the characteristics of Persian ceramic production in medieval times from the perspective of text analysis and the technology of pottery making. The technology of rainbow and Raju Wadi pottery used in the establishment of the palace of Takht-e Soleiman during the period of Ilkhanate administration embodies the characteristics of Abū῾l-Qāsim's text. Key words: Middle Ages；Abū῾l-Qāsim；Persian ceramics

一、引言 西姆（Abū῾l-Qāsim Jamāl al-Dīn ῾Abdallāh）著 有《完者都史》 （Tārīkh-i Uljaytū）。这本著作 伊本·阿比·塔希尔（Ibn AbīTāhir）家族 完成于 1303 年，包含名为《宝石珍品》 （῾Arā῾is 是中世纪波斯陶工家族中陶器制作历史最长 al-jawāhir wa nafā῾is al-atā῾ib）的附录（以下简 的。早期作品可追溯至埃及伊斯兰艺术博物 称《论述》），由于阿布尔·卡西姆出身于陶器 馆（Museum of Islamic Art）收藏的 1 件 13 世纪 生产世家，因而对制陶原料的来源、提炼、配 早期签名为“阿布·塔希尔·伊本·胡萨伊”（Abū 方，以及装饰技法和烧成技术均有特别详尽的 [1] ① Tāhir ibn Husayn）的珐琅陶瓷碗 。伊本·阿 论述 。 比·塔希尔家族中的第三代成员——阿布尔·卡

10 传统手工艺面对现代工具的创新
—— 以手推绣为例
On The Innovation of Traditional Handicraft Using Modern Tools： A Case Study of Hand-push Embroidery
金洋 JIN Yang 西南大学，重庆400700 （Southwest University，400700 Chongqing）
摘要：在科技发展迅速的今天，各种现代工具和机器的出现给传统手工艺带来了很大的冲击，如何合理利用现代科技来延续传统 手工艺的生命力是需要探讨的课题。手推绣作为现代工具和传统工艺相结合的代表产物之一，值得深入研究。通过对手推绣的手 艺人情况、手艺传承情况、技艺发展和传承模式进行调研，分析手推绣的发展现状，针对手推绣发展过程中出现的问题，思考传 统手工艺的可持续发展对策，认为可以利用新科技来适应不断发展的市场动态和消费者的需求，保留其工艺的艺术化特点和核心 技术，与时俱进推陈出新。 关键词：手推绣；现代工具；创新 Abstract: With the rapid development of science and technology， the use of modern tools and machines has brought great impact on traditional handicraft. How to use modern science and technology to continue the vitality of traditional handicraft appropriately is the main problem to be discussed in this paper. it is worth to study and discuss the hand-push embroidery， which is one of the representative products of the combination of modern tool and traditional craft. Through investigating and researching the situation of hand-push embroidery artists from aspects of handicraftsman， handicraft inheritance， technology development and inheritance mode， this paper analyzes and studies the present development of hand-push embroidery， and puts forward some concrete suggestions for the problems in the development process of hand-push embroidery. In order to arouse the thinking of the sustainable development of traditional handicraft， new science and technology can be used to adapt to the constantly developing market and consumer values， but also to retain the artistic characteristics and core technology of the craft， using a variety of measures and means to prolong its vitality. Key words: hand-push embroidery； modern tool； innovation

摘要：《戴珍珠耳环的少女》这幅历史名作中少女回眸时神秘的微笑，让不少人为之着迷，其故事还被拍成同名电影，电影虽是虚 构，却很好地传达了维米尔对于艺术的追求精神以及画作想表达的内在情感。本文结合画作和同名电影，分析了维米尔如何运用 艺术创作手法形成视觉色彩、表达情感内容、创造艺术内涵。 关键词：《戴珍珠耳环的少女》；视觉色彩；艺术情感；表现手法 Abstract: This historical painting of Girl with a Pearl Earring is deeply loved by the public, especially the mysterious smile when the girl returns, which makes many people fascinated. The film, although fictional, can also reflect Vermeer’s spirit of pursuing art, better understand the inner feelings that the painting wants to express, and analyze the artistic creation of Vermeer through the combination of painting and film. The technique forms its visual color and emotional content, reflecting a highly profound artistic connotation. 摘要：当代景观被描述为基于多元“事件”而生成的隐喻文本 ，其自身的工具性和言说性功能转化为具有复合向度的叙事结构 。通 过梳理空间设计与叙事观念的思维融合和前期探索 ，对景观叙事的外延与内涵做出新的阐释；构建由自然 、社会 、文化事件组成 的坐标系统 ，解析景观与事件的时空转换关系 ，阐明当代景观形成的深层动因；以景观与当代事件的分析为基础 ，提出共时语境 下景观基于人 、自然 、文化的动态关系而生成的叙事维度 ，结合国外的实验案例论证其构建的现实意义。 关键词： 景观叙事；叙事维度；生态；人文；社会 Abstract: Contemporary landscape has been described as the metaphorical text based on multiple events，whose functions of instrumentality and utterance have been translated into a narrative structures of the recombination dimensions. This paper looks at the thoughts fusion and early exploration of the space design and narrative concept to interpret the denotation and connotation of landscape narratives to build a coordinate system composed of nature，society and culture. It aims to analyze the transform relationships between landscape and events in the specific space-time，and clarify the causes of contemporary landscape formation. On the basis of relationships between the landscape and contemporary events，the paper introduces the landscape narrative dimensions that are formed from the dynamic relationships between man，nature and culture in the synchronic context，with overseas experimental cases to prove the realistic meanings of dimensions. Key words: landscape narrative；narrative dimensions；Ecology；humanity；society

摘要：随着信息化的发展，建筑设计业的数字媒体资产已形成海量的图片和视频资源，传统的管理方式已无法满足建筑业数字媒 体资产的管理需求。首先解析数字媒体资产管理的概念，深入分析数字媒体资产管理平台设计的关键要素，提出数字资源原理平 台的架构模型，为建筑设计业数字媒体资源管理提供参考和借鉴。 关键词：数字媒体资产；信息化；平台设计；平台架构 Abstract: With the development of Informatization, the digital media assets of the construction industry have produced a huge amount of pictures and video resources. Traditional management methods can no longer meet the management requirements of digital media assets in the construction industry. This paper first analyzes the concept of digital media asset management, then deeply analyzes the key elements of the platform design of digital media asset management. It also propose an effective architecture model of digital resource principle platform to provide reference and reference for digital media resource management in construction industry. When the imprint contains the fragrance of books：An experimental exploration of the use of convex print art style in manual book design
胡超 HU Chao 马飞飞 MA Feifei 1 2 1. 江西农业大学，江西南昌 330045（Jiangxi Agricultural University，330045 Nanchang Jiangxi） 2. 普迪学校，浙江宁波 315031（Pudi School，315031 Ningbo Zhejiang）
摘要：“手工书装设计”主要研究书籍生产过程中的装潢设计工作。人们对纸媒书籍的特殊情感，触发装帧手工书的热潮，精致素 雅的手工书深受大众欢迎，更被书籍爱好者收藏。正因如此，国内高校“书籍装帧设计”课程教学开始手工书装设计技能的培养。 以高校艺术院系“书籍装帧设计”课程为实验载体，以版画创意思维为逻辑构建，注重凸版画艺术语言与内外形式，在图文媒介 “纸媒书籍”装帧设计中的形式演化与拓展，实验性地以版画的本体属性“肌理与印痕”所传递的视知觉为研究切入点，深入剖析手 工书装工艺中的造型设计、结构设计及外观设计这3个构成因素及其相关概念、起源及发展过程。 关键词：手工书装；凸版画；刻痕印迹；质料触感；艺术语式 Abstract: The course Handmade Book Design is a core course of art design in terms of studying the decoration design work in the process of book production in colleges and universities. People become interested in book binding because of special feelings on the paper books which are collected by book enthusiasts. The course Handmade Book Design in domestic colleges and universities aims to cultivate students’ skills in book binding design. It constructs the creative thinking of printmaking, focuses on the form evolution and expansion of the engraving art language and internal and external forms in the graphic paper book binding design, and experimentally takes the Noumenon attribute of printmaking. The entry point of research is the visual perception transmitted by the skin texture and the imprint, then in-depth analysis of the composition factors and their related concepts, origins and development process in three aspects of the design, structure design and appearance design of the manual book-binding process. Key words: handmade book；convex print；engraved imprint；material touch；art language

17 用户体验视角下设计引领互联网产品微创新研究
Research on Micro-innovation of Leading Internet Product Design in the Perspective of User Experience
赖红波 Lai Hongbo 储艳霞 Chu Yanxia 上海理工大学管理学院， 上海 200093 （School of Management， University of Shanghai for Science and Technology，200093 Shanghai）
摘要：随着互联网向移动化、信息化、大众化的发展，多种多样的互联网产品已经融入人们生活的方方面面。如何更好的提升顾 客在使用互联网产品过程中的用户体验，这要求互联网企业在设计互联网产品时须在满足用户需求的前提下不断“微创新”，这个 “微创新”的过程就是对产品的不足之处不断改进的过程。了解用户是设计的前端和根本，互联网产品的设计需要呈现一种简洁、 愉悦的情感体验，图文化、融合化、情感化、个性化、渐进改善的设计创新能更好体现互联网产品创新，满足用户多样化的需求。 关键词：设计引领创新；用户体验；互联网产品；微创新 Abstract: With the development of Internet and mobile technology, many Internet products have been integrated into all aspects of people's lives. To better enhance the user experience of customers in the process of using Internet products, it is necessary for Internet enterprises to design Internet products in order to meet the needs of users under the premise of continuous "micro-innovation", a process to constantly improve user experience. Understanding users is the front-end and fundamental of design. In the network era, the design of Internet products needs to present a concise and pleasant emotional experience. The design innovation of graphic culture, integration, emotion, individualization and gradual improvement can better reflect the innovation of Internet products and meet the diversified needs of users. Key words: design leading innovation；user experience；internet products；micro-innovation

摘要：本文选择改革开放以来城市夜景照明为研究对象，尝试着分析和概括了当代景观照明的“舞台化”的三个属性、景观照明舞 台化的三个运行机制以及景观照明舞台化的三个应用策略，期冀对我国当代景观照明的舞台化学理研究有所助益，且为今后的景 观照明研究提供一种借鉴和参考。 关键词：景观照明；舞台照明；机制；应用 Abstract: The research object of this paper is the design of city night lighting in China after the 1980s. This paper analyzes the stage attributes of landscape lighting, the operational mechanism of stage lighting and applications. It aims to provide suggestions for city night lighting design and construction in China. Key words: landscape lighting； stage illumination； operation mechanism； application

刘琳 LIU LIN 武汉理工大学，湖北武汉 430070（Wuhan University of Technology，430070 Wuhan Hubei）
摘要：本文以用户体验为中心为数字游牧民提出针对性的服务设计，解决目标用户触点问题，完善数字游牧民服务设计体系。运 用文献分析法、材料分析法、模拟服务场景的服务蓝图分析法，梳理出数字游牧民在服务设计流程中各阶段的触点，划分现存问 题和优化目标。对比目前相关服务设计发展情况，总结现存问题和盲点，结合实际案例提供解决方法和探讨解决思路。为数字游 牧民提供服务设计和设计方案，包括徽章设计、APP设计，以提升用户在服务流程中的体验，优化服务设计体系。 关键词：数字游牧民；用户体验；服务设计 Abstract: The paper Focuses on user experience as the center for digital nomads to propose targeted service design to solve the problem of target user contact and improve the digital nomad's service design system. It uses the literature analysis, material analysis, and service blueprint analysis to simulate the service scene. It sorts out the contacts of digital nomads in various stages of the service design process, divides existing problems and optimizes the objectives, compares the current development of related service design, summarizes existing problems and blind spots, and discusses solutions by combining practical cases. Digital nomad service design meets market demand, provides non-face-to-face instant information, proposes service design strategies and design solutions, simplifies the process of digital nomads to obtain information, and can effectively solve user contact problems, thereby integrating and optimizing service design systems. Key words: digital nomad；user experience；service design

Research on Color Design in Urban Outdoor Sports Space
刘梦萱 LIU Mengxuan 范兆祥 FAN Zhaoxiang 哈尔滨工业大学，黑龙江哈尔滨 150001（Harbin Institute of technology，15000 Harbin Heilongjiang）
摘要：居民对运动健康日益重视，各大城市开始兴建户外运动空间。其在大批量建设中，色彩设计在一定程度上被忽略，导致部 分运动休闲空间与整体城市风貌不符，缺少空间活力。因此，以城市户外运动空间的色彩设计为研究对象，运用色彩视觉感知及 体育运动心理学的相关理论，通过对哈尔滨市、沈阳市、上海市、苏州市、重庆市、南京市的实地调研，分析空间色彩现状，并 针对性提出运动空间整体色彩地域性把控、不同类型空间色彩的特殊化处理及夜间照明色彩设计这3个设计方法，以期为相关实 践提供借鉴。 关键词：色彩设计；运动空间；视觉环境；公共空间 Abstract: As residents pay more attention to sports health， major cities have begun to build outdoor sports space. However，in the large scale construction， the color design has been neglected to some extent， which has caused some sports and leisure spaces to be inconsistent with the overall urban style and lacked space vitality. Therefore， this paper takes the color design of urban outdoor sports space as the research object， and uses the theory of color visual perception and sports psychology. Through the field research in Harbin， Shenyang， Shanghai， Suzhou， Chongqing and Nanjing， the current situation of spatial color is analyzed. Aiming at the status quo problem， the design methods of the overall color regionality control， the specialization of different types of space colors and the night lighting color design are proposed， in order to provide some reference for future related practice. Key words: color design；sports space；visual environment；public space

A study on the Creation and Communication of Core Socialist Values in Storytelling
郑建鹏 ZHENG Jianpeng 山东工艺美术学院，山东济南 250300 （Shangdong University of Art & Design，250300 Jinan Shandong）
摘要：社会主义核心价值观视觉故事体系由故事类型、故事母题和故事文本三个层面组成。社会主义核心价值观十二组词语代表 了十二个故事类型，每个类型下有不同的故事母题，而母题下呈现的故事文本有来自于历史的、现实的和创意的三种，每个故事 文本都应由具体的人、事、情节组成。社会主义核心价值观主题宣传常用的视觉修辞手法是比喻、夸张和比拟，其主题作品传播 应特别注意风格化、社交化与产品化三项核心策略。 关键词：社会主义核心价值观；故事化；视觉叙事 Abstract: The visual story system of core socialist values consists of three levels: story type, story motif and story text. The twelve phrases of core socialist values represent twelve story types, each of which has different story motifs. The story text presented under the motif has three kinds: historical, realistic and creative. Each story text should be composed of specific people, events and plots. The common visual rhetoric techniques used in the propaganda of socialist core values are metaphor, exaggeration and analogy. The dissemination of thematic works should pay special attention to the three core strategies of stylization, socialization and productivity. Key words: core socialist values；storytelling；visual narration

摘要：陶瓷艺术最初是以日用陶瓷产品的形式起源的，但在陶瓷制作工艺日臻完美的背后，存在着一个无法回避的问题，那就是 日用陶瓷产品的设计严重滞后，这已成为制约这个行业健康发展的重要因素。本文通过分析日用陶瓷产品的特征，以茶具为切入 点，提出以语意设计角度入手，提升日用陶瓷产品的内涵，分别从模拟法、叙事法和寓意法进行具体阐述，为日用陶瓷产品设计 提供有效的参考。 关键词：日用陶瓷；茶具；语意设计；内涵 Abstract: Ceramic art originated from domestic ceramic products, but when the production technique has advanced much, the design of domestic ceramics has lagged behind and become a hindrance to the development of the industry. This paper takes tea sets as the case and analyzes the characteristics of the domestic ceramic to find ways to enhance the connotation of domestic ceramic in semantic design angle from the aspects of simulating, narrating and allegory. Key words: domestic ceramics；tea set；semantic design；connotation

摘要：为了使少数民族特有的手工技法及其产品在当今社会得到传承与发扬，并且适应当下服装的设计与生产需求，本文通过分 析传统火草布的传统造型特征以及加工方式，结合当下流行的环保3R理念以及现代服装设计理论，力求探索火草布在现代时装中 的创新应用方法。 关键词：火草布；造型特征；现代服装；设计手法 Abstract: Fire grass cloth is a kind of traditional fabrics which is only reserved among Yi and Lisu nationalities, and its weaving technology is listed as the national intangible cultural heritage. In order to make the unique handicraft techniques and products of minority nationalities inherit and develop in today's society and adapt to the current clothing design and production needs, this paper analyzes the traditional modeling characteristics and processing methods of the cloth, combined with the current popular environmental protection 3R concept and modern clothing design theory, and strives to explore the innovative application of fire grass cloth in modern fashion. Key words: fire grass cloth；modeling features； modern clothing；design techniques
